title: Start page when launching Private Windows doesn't respect 'new page' settings.
content:
Hello.

I have my Home settings configured for:

Home Page and New Windows: Blank Page New Tabs: Blank Page.

When I launch Firefox in normal mode (non-Private), I get a blank page. Exactly what I configured it for.

When I launch a Private Window, I get a NON-blank page. Rather I get a promotional page for the Mozilla VPN with the banner "Get privacy protections everywhere you browse". This is not a blank page, it is a promotional page for a service I don't care to use. If I press the HOME button I get the blank page but private windows don't start that way.

Is there a way to configure Private Windows to open a blank page as I have it set for?

I checked 'about:config', search for "vpn" and "private" and disable 'promo' settings, reset the promo VPN links to "about:blank", hide the 'vpn banner' and so on but nothing gets rid of it.

Thank you in advance for any assistance.

RS
creator: RSloan

title: Found a Great New Way to set Startup Pages
content:
You need to have your history on for this to work.

Pin the Tabs you want to have startup with the Browser. EG Email, Chat, Rainbo.io, etc

When finishing your session leave these PINNED Tabs Open and Select the X in the upper right hand corner.

Start Firefox as you normally would and you will see that any PINNED Tab will automatically reopen in a new Firefox Session.

This avoids setting multiple pages as I have found you can cause your startup pages to reappear again when you are using Firefox. Works Slick and is much Cleaner. 

   Enjoy!!
creator: brent.ruggles

title: [RECLAMAÇÃO] Função "Restaurar" utilizando tecla shift e função Sincronizar.
content:
Infelizmente tive o desprazer de abrir o Firefox acidentalmente com a tecla shift pressionada. Essa "MARAVILHA" restaurou por completo, como se estivesse sido reinstalado. Custava deixar totalmente explícito o que iria acontecer?! Uma mensagem em size 500, em vermelho e em bold, um popup de confirmação... que seja, qualquer coisa.

Após algum momento de muita raiva, fui tentar recuperar TODAS as configurações que eu havia feito através da opção Sincronizar. Porém de nada adiantou. Muito tempo perdido configurando item à item do Firefox, extensão à extensão.

De que adianta vocês colocarem a bendita mensagem que estou sincronizando "Configurações" se o mesmo não se é feito???

Eu havia configurado um diretório específico para downloads, eu havia configurado exceções (muitas) no tópico Privacidade e Segurança -> Cookies e dados de segurança -> Gerenciar exceções, eu havia configurado diversas opções em Pesquisa -> Atalhos de pesquisa, eu estava logado em diversas extensões.

Tudo resumido à tempo perdido.
creator: rodrigoplc95

title: Pressing CTRL zooms out
content:
Today I ran into an issue I never experienced before and which I somehow can't fix. Whenever I hit the CTRL button (e.g. for CTRL+F, CTRL+A, CTRL+C, etc.) the zoom is decreased by 10%. Same goes when I use the CTRL button to zoom with the mouse wheel.

I'm using Firefox 94.0.1 (64-bit) under Windows 10

I tried closing the browser and opening it again, restarting the computer and using Firefox in Troubleshoot Mode, but the problem persists. A search in the forum here and on google yielded no relevant results.

Anybody who's got some good advice for me? Thank you very much.
creator: claudegeorges
